评论详情: They are super comfortable and true to size.  I am 5'10'' and weigh around 150 lbs.  I went with a large, only because that was the only size they had available when I ordered them.  You see, I am a shark when it comes to shopping.  I pick it up, put it down.  Pick it up, put it down.  Add it to my cart and circle it over and over and over and over and OVER until I finally get a little stoned and finally commit to spending $30.00 on myself lol (I am sure I am not the only one who does this...right, right...RIGHT?)They are true to size and well made, plus super comfortable.  Keep in mind when buying these though, they are hand wash only.

These pants fit perfectly! They cinch at the waist but they aren't super tight and they're the perfect length! Beautiful colors and amazing material that feels very good quality:) make sure to handwash them- just be warned that the colors bleed a lot, so don't handwash them with lights or with hot water.
Son loves them, quickly because a fav to wear. They are a tad thin.

I wanted patchwork pants not lingerie! I bought these pants and they fit fine I wore them once to work for 4 hours and they tore in the front down the seam, I sewed them and wore them one more time at work…. commando and as i am walking in front of customers I felt like something wasn’t right so I asked a coworker and sure enough there was a hole in the seam and my asscrack was exposed to customers for who knows how long. By the end of the night (6hour shift) and it completely torn and my whole ass was out I had to wear a jacket  around my waist. Extremely disappointing and embarrassing $55 for public indecency no thank you. Wont give me a refund either, absolutely ridiculous. They were only worn for a total of 10 hours…

At first I ordered a small for my 5'4" daughter. They fit  but not nice and comfy/baggy, so we returned them. The next largest size available at the time was XL, so I thought I'd get those for her to try as they have a drawstring.  She likes them.I have attached a pic of her wearing both pairs for comparison.
These bohemian pants are better than expected! great quality and value.

these pants are really nice, but the material feels too cheap for how expensive it is. i got these for my boyfriend and they fit a little snug even though i got a size up. they also ripped 2 days into him wearing them.

echoing some other reviews that it runs small for what it's supposed to be.  I wear XL in gym/athletic pants.  I ordered XL of a different pattern of these pants from same vendor and trying these on they probably match the fit in XL gym/athletic pants, BUT 1) these are supposed to be a bit more flowing and roomy, and more importantly 2) these are 100% cotton and will likely shrink.  in fact, I'm counting on more than typical shrinkage based on the kind of loose knit cotton material, so I'm definitely not putting them in the dryer.  I ended up ordering this pair in XXL, and the fit is much better after handwashing and hanging to dry

评论概述: Good pants but do have downsides
评论详情: They're great pants and I love the way they look, but unfortunately after a couple months of wearing them every few weeks, they've developed holes and pilling around the crotch. Personally, I'm not too mad about this because I often put patches on a lot of my clothing, but it is disappointing to have happen on an item with such a price.

评论概述: The Tight elastic stays tight...TOO TIGHT! The quality of the fabric is GARBAGE feels like cardboard
评论详情: First off, I bought this product when it was barely $20.... they got greedy and shot up the price to now $52 which is just absurd considering the crap quality of these pants.  They're not airy either, the pictures seriously do NOT do it justice, it's no wonder they're stingy with the pictures.  The quality seriously sucks. Even if you don't believe me and you buy it, you will feel and see for yourself.  $10 would be a more justified price of these and even then considering the quality and the construction of these it would still be questionable. The inside of them aren't comfortable, like I said the construction of them is horrible. The seams and meeting of the patches inside the pants all stick out, so they will itch you.  Why is it itchy? Well look at the crap quality of them. You'll feel for yourself if you do make the mistake of supporting this greedy company.  Good luck.  Hopefully this saves the next person from a mistake. I wish you can write replies to comments here so others can let me know of the mistake after they bought it 🙃.  Peace be with you.

So I order a size large for more baggy, but I was wrong, I guess my thighs are too plumped for the inseam, ahaha.

Bought these for my boyfriend (5'11", about 180 lbs, 36 waist). They fit him well, and he loves them. They seem like decent quality as he has worn them and washed them often. Would get more if they came in other colors.

First off, these are not harem pants, as they are advertised. The fit is like regular pants. They are also made out of thin material and seem cheaply made. They look okay, but I've only worn them a couple of times and the crotch seam is already beginning to rip. Not at all worth 50 bucks.

Also I have ordered the same pants before in a different color from this seller and they fit perfect but these are significantly smaller even though I ordered the same size as before which leads me to believe that they might have been marked wrong for sizing.

评论概述: The inseam is smaller than I'd like but otherwise fits fine and super comfy
评论详情: I was originally looking for "hippie" pants to wear for Halloween and my girlfriend came across these and sent them to me. At first I thought I was looking for bell-bottom jeans but these are SO much better. I can't wait to wear these at Halloween and then continue to use them for lounge pants around the house. To be honest, they aren't my daily dress style but I can absolutely see someone eclectic wearing them out and rocking them hard. The only complaint I have is the inseam is smaller than I'd prefer (hugs the boys more than my preferred comfort level) but even with that they're still a very comfortable and high quality pant that I would recommend.

these pants are absolutely perfect. i love them so so much!!! i’m 5’1” and they still fit great, just more of an oversized look!! they have scrunchie bottoms at the ankles so they fit like oversized sweatpants!! they’re light, so probably not the best to wear for really cold weather unless you wear other pants underneath like leggings!! they’re perfect, my new favorite pants!! :)

really like these pants. the first time I washed them, all of my clothes that were also in the wash at the same time has blotches of miscellaneous colored dye everywhere...so make sure you wash these pants separate a couple of times before you throw them in with everything else. along with this and wear comes noticeable vibrance loss. nevertheless, the pants are still dope and super comfy. I'm 5'6 and have rather long legs so I was pleasantly surprised when these pants actually fit me, height wise. I ordered the S/M
